EmailTemplate.name: Demo Request Attribution.Autoresponder
EmailTemplate.subject: Your BigCommerce Demo Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for your interest in BigCommerce. We have received your request and will be in touch shortly.
Kind regards, Jeremy Peabody Ecommerce Business Consultant jeremy.peabody@bigcommerce.com <mailto:jeremy.peabody@bigcommerce.com> / 1-844-632-8912 <tel:+18446328912> bigcommerce.com <[[http://www.bigcommerce.com]]>
